mapper.select: SELECT d.department_id, d.department_title, count(*) "count" FROM employee e JOIN department d ON (e.department_id = d.department_id) WHERE enabled=1 and not d.department_id ='ADM' GROUP BY d.department_id, d.department_title ORDER BY DECODE(department_id,'CEO',1), d.department_title
SELECT * FROM job where not job_id in ('Admin') order by job_title DESC
